name: Facebook - Kimi no Na Wa [ 君の名は。]
description:
Skin for Facebook, Kimi no Na Wa. Both login panel basic skin. Preview login: puu.sh/xgt5c/dbd330865a.jpg
Preview feed: puu.sh/xgt6z/4b58f07a7d.jpg
Anime Kimi no Na Wa skin for Facebook. If you found any bug, glitch, etc please let me know, I'll try to fix it.
contact me: Tomas D The copyright of the image belong to https://www.zerochan.net/2042407
additional_info:
